structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: Assessment of repayment ordered as cost -- Time of repayment -- Court clerk's duties.

text.section:
Upon an order to repay a reward or part of a reward under KRS 431.590, the court shall assess this cost against the defendant in the same manner as other costs of prosecution are assessed against a defendant. The court shall order the defendant to:
Pay the entire amount required when sentence is pronounced; or
Pay the entire amount required at a later date specified by the court.

After receiving a payment from a person ordered to make the payment under this section, the clerk of the court shall:
Make a record of the payment;
Forward the payment to the designated crime stoppers organization; and
Record the forwarding of the payment.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 6, July 14, 1992.
